name: The Truth Revealed
paragraphs: You finally uncover the truth about the secret organization, and it's worse than you ever could have imagined. They have been experimenting with a dangerous virus in order to create superhumans, and the hospital incident was just the tip of the iceberg. As you gather more evidence, you start to realize that your life is in danger.

You decide to take the evidence to the authorities and try to stop the organization from causing any further harm. With the help of the police, you stage a raid on the organization's headquarters, and after a tense standoff, they are taken into custody. You feel like justice has been served, but you can't shake off the feeling that there might be other organizations out there like this one, waiting to cause havoc on innocent lives.
